item.title: MIUI OS2.0.108.0.VNKCNXM Recovery update for Redmi K70 China
item.description:
New Stable Recovery update available!

Size: 7.4 GB

MD5: a627f803806cdb97458ec8ead0da4a4d

Fix: The screen froze and became unresponsive in some cases
[System]
Optimization: System stability
Fix: Errors occurred in some cases

[Home screen]
Removed the option for swiping up on the Home screen to open search
